Author: lo_pan
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: With the total crypto marketcap shrinking to $322 billion from $800 billion at the beginning of the year, there is no way these lending platforms can operate efficiently in this down market. With all those of you who are spreading FUD about Hextra need to consider is that a lending platform thrives in a healthy market and people making loans. Without those elements, how can anyone be surprised that the platform wouldn't place measures to control the price and people dumping. These measures are actually an indication that they care about the project.  I would love to be able to withdraw some btc right now but I understand that if that was allowed to happen, we would likely end up with a 404 page error. All we can do is wait for the market to improve and see what Hextra does afterwards. Not really much for Hextra to say now when things look like a dogs breakfast across the board.  Does everyone agree the lending space has changed from when it was only Bitconnect? Back then people would reinvest and keep lending. Now generally people just want to dump because they know the lending space has the fastest ROI. Do you guys think that helps the platform to grow? The next generation of lending platforms will be smarter and will likely use more tactics to prevent the amount of coins we can sell at a given time, control pricing, go under the radar and not draw attention etc.

Author: jes3874
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: I'm so sorry for your loss. But still, being negative is not good for the community at this very moment even for you. When system is back to normal and everything stabilized, support team will for sure recover your account and you'd better have 1 HXT = 10$ than 1 HXT = 0$. You have to know that ppl who invested 100k+ have issues with customer support of credible companies like Coinbase, Bittrex, and Poloniex. My friend's 20k is still stuck in his Coinbase account for 4 weeks. Cryptocurrency market overall is a bit  sloppy and unorganized and that's a risk that you have to embrace. I don't think quality of Hextracoin support system is a large deviation from the average quality customer service of major Cryptocurrency marketplace.  I do understand the motive behind your criticism and it's totally understandable. However, criticizing is not the fastest way to get your fund back when there are more than thousands of ppl out there complaining like a teenager. You have to realize that they have no legal right to give your fund back plus they can always just bail out without any loss from them. It's not like Stock market when stock price goes down company and its holder go down together. Spreading FUD will ruin the community and if they decide to exit because of that, that is our loss not them. You still have your account and fund. You just can't access to it. If you can prove that it's yours, you have pretty good chance to get your account and money back. So Think wisely.

Author: lo_pan
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: Spreading FUD doesn't help at all. It would have been nice to keep getting profits while they were down but let's be realistic. How can profits be calculated when they were hacked and the platform was offline? Less greed would help a lot of people go through these rough patches and understand things rationally. I'm sure everyone has noticed that the interest rates are much higher since they've been back. We need to give Hextra a chance to make things right, which I think they will. People were so quick to say that Hextra was doing an exit scam after the HXG dropped but they came back as promised. For anyone who took part in the ICO would also remember they shut the site down after one day of operating to do some maintenance and came back the following week as promised.  Sure things are not perfect and you probably have to send an annoying amount of complaints to get your issues resolved but that's life. We all took a high risk gamble getting into this so please remind yourself of that. Be happy that they even came back and are offering interest still. Other platforms have days of 0%, you know what I'm taking about.  I got did see a message on telegram from Hextra that stated they have developed a pricing schedule that they will aim to stick to. Although it looks very good, it also gives me the idea that they may not go to an external exchange anytime soon until they can get proper control of the price.  Price schedule: https://imgur.com/a/r7UQm  Telegram: https://t.me/hextracoin

I'm all right with playing the long game as I don't have that much invested compared to many others, but on the FB page I see that people are getting pretty nervous and I believe that as soon as (and if) there is no limit on selling anymore, that many people will run to Davor or back to Bitconnect. Author: BigX84
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: Received my Hextra Gold and directly lend it all, as that is what it's meant for anyway!  The thing that I find the most annoying is that Hextra is trying to reward the true/initial investors with HXG and somehow people take this whole process to bring the platform down! Yes, they have some delay on their roadmap, but HXG was never included in the roadmap and that took time and resources to get done! The always kept their promises so have some faith!  The whole price dip came from people trying to take advantage of the HXG by coming in before the snapshot and withdrawing like crazy again afterwards. These same people will now wait 30 days and will all try to take the HXG + interest cash total out of the program at the earliest convenience! That will potentially be bad for the HXF price again! That was not what HXG was meant for... It's meant to reinvest!!!  Of course everyone should be able to cash in on their profits every now and again, but it is killing for ANY system if the majority of the community does this at the same time. What happens If we all run to our regular banks at the same time and withdraw all our funds?? That's how whole economic systems crash! The same goed for these lending platforms! Hextra is right to limit this behaviour in some sort of way (limiting the possibility to sell HXT, at least for a sub market price) because it is destroying the system imho.  If everyone just keep reinvesting their money and cashes out some nice amounts at random moments then these lending platforms will flourish, but the crazy amount of day trading and panic reactions are dangerous and ill adviced! There are different (ie. not lending) platforms for that you know?  Anyway...just my two cents 😊

Author: BigX84
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: I feel what you're saying but it's exactly those panic reactions that cause platforms to fail imho. If the whole community reacts with massive dumping after every little hiccup, it's very hard for a platform to be consistent. I believe that if you have invested in a program, ride it out, especially when the price is very low at any given time...the loss is already there if you cash out and if people decide to pay support, the chances are way better that the platform grows again!  To me, Hextra has shown that is committed to stay around, because if they wanted to do an exit scam, weren't the moments right after ICO and the snapshot the perfect times to do so? If we conclude that they indeed are here to stay, wouldn't it make sense to support them instead of the massive community dump that just happened?

Body: A bit afraid of dumping, look at regal price now Dont know whats wrong with them though [/quote] The snapshot is at 11:59PM UTC/6:59PM EST on 12/25. Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: Well, it looks like a major dumping prior to gold is happening   I guess people are afraid they wont be back. Do or die guys. less than 50 minutes left before they snapshot.  I am going to let my last $2000 ride as a loan(.16BTC)  Bought back at 103000, left me with 160+7 more for interest.  Seeing if it rises  then loaning.

Author: coinjack1337
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: Thanks, just found their post. But they didn't state how they will calculate how much HXT you got in lending. There are 2 Scenarios:  1) The amount of HXT you initially put in lending (i.e. you lended 20 HXT on Nov. 1st so you will get 10 HXG on Dec. 25th) 2) The amount in USD in your lending account by Dec. 25th (i.e. you lended 20 HXT on Nov 1st - were about 300$ then, but till December the price rises to let's say 40$ each HXT - 300$ / 40$ = 7.5 HXT / 2 = 3.75 HXG)  Any ideas about this?

Author: andre1980
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: It will be based on HXT, they will take a snapshot of your account Dec. 24/25th, so only option 1 seems logical. It doesn't matter if you set a loan today or around that time. As long as you have HXT on the snapshot date, you get your alloted HXG.  I'm waiting for a better value before setting a loan for instance.

Author: coinjack1337
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: Think about it: They take the snapshot and your account says you have 300$ active investment in your lending acc. So to my mind, they will calculate from there and of course with the price of HXT to the time of the snapshot.  It's nothing more than a "picture" of all accs and balances. So how could they determine the initial value of your investment?

Author: andre1980
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: No, you only see the loan balance, they can see what the initial investment was. Otherwise no one in their right mind would setup loans just for HXT. If you read their posts, it's based on invested HXT. Not USD. If i loan 200HXT today, keep 200HXT in wallet, i get 150HXG. If i do the same but on Dec. 24th, EVEN if HXT is 30+USD by then, i get 150HXG. That's the only fair way and the only way to easily calculate.  If they would use USD value, looking of Hextra's past history: that's gonna go very wrong and they would lose any credibility.  Also, day 1 i had a 16USD loan setup for 100HXT and another for 100. I'm about 99% sure that said the amount of HXT invested and at what rate. They might have changed that by now. Total was 3200USD worth (after the reset waiting on a better rate now)

Author: MinerClub
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: This ^  All crypto lending programs are Ponzis. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ponzi_scheme  When you see keywords like "volatility trading bot", "cryptocurrency tumbler", or "reselling and logistics of diodes and laser based electronic components to high demand areas", those are all fronts.  These programs are all funded simply by future investments. That's how you are paid.  These programs are able to sustain from "Deposits", "Reinvestments", and "Referrals" which equal more Deposits and Reinvestments.  That being said, it doesn't mean that these platforms can't be profitable for you.  It just means to make sure you see through the BS and know what you are getting involved in.  Those that blindly believe and trust these "companies" will get burned.  Those who play the game, and understand the risk should be fine. There will be winners and losers.  Generally lending platforms backed by a coin have lasted longer.  Lastly, never put in more than you are willing to lose.  Hextra seems to be a good investment so far, let's see how the withdrawals work out on the 9th.  To everyone who has invested, Good luck!

Author: andre1980
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: Did you follow the same ICO as we did? The whole ICO itself was a clusterfuck, 95% of people could not get in. Not only due too the many visitors, but the site could not handle the load and had other login and captcha failures. They could have easily fix the site then, instead of waiting until everyone was using the site to invest, buy, sell, lend, withdraw.  Obviously the were NOT prepared or they would have fixed things earlier or had a 1 day maintenance. It's a simple fix, not 7 days to fix withdraws and exchange.  Besides: advertise these maintenances a few days before. Not while 80% are still waiting on their withdrawals!  I was ID 2148 and they were not processing mine yet..

Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: I invested what i could afford to lose, the minute it leaves your wallet it's out of your hands anyway. Not scared at all, been in the Crypto game long enough (2013/14), i'm just realistic. They have made zero efforts to fix the site during ICO, don't communicate at all, zero support.. They had a short maintenance yesterday which was enough to get the exchange and lending up, etc. And now they need a week to fix simple withdraws?  All the while we have NO idea if the coins are there at all, if the loans are in place, if payouts are working, what the rate is.. If our withdraws are cancelled, stuck or whatever..  They could just disable parts, like buy, sell, withdraw so we at least get to check status.  IF they return, i hope they will make up for it by extra interest, extra HXT or extra HXG. Otherwise, people that didn't schedule loans yet will just dump the coin November 9th. Which will only devalue the coin more.

Some users kept on withdrawing their BTC to their personal wallets - *We think* Hextra found this glitch. Since this was a CRITICAL GLITCH, Hextra decided to close their website! Author: andre1980
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: All in all it's the most unprofessional ICO i ever got into..  Coins almost impossible to get, buggy site, unable to withdraw until you had 50HXT from ICO..  Then it came with the exchange, but the first days rate was too late for the lending.. Then i was unable to withdraw just 30 USD worth of BTC to test due too server issues.. Then i was number 2149 in withdraw queue AND i'm still waiting on my coin.  I hope they'll return, but i don't get my hopes up. 7 days is far too long and i'm guessing HXT will lose about 70% of it's value by then. They should keep at least the lending up so you can check the rates, payouts, etc.  Closing the complete site is just unprofessional, but that was obvious from the start due too the lack of support. They didn't even announce this and were only live with the exchange less than a day!  For prosperity:  I Invested 200HXT of 3180USD value yesterday at a rate of 1.35+0.15, which would net me 300+USD by next week. Still have 200HXT in wallet.  Waiting on 0.004BTC to test from Yesterday.. Still nothing..

It wasn't fixed.  It wasn't a scam.  It wasn't rigged.  I bought it, and had many friends that bought it numerous, numerous times.  So please quit with all the "it's rigged" crap.  Secondly, the site is fully functional.  I've transferred Hextra to other people.  I've put BTC on.  I've taken BTC off.  No scam.  No nefarious scheme to hold onto your BTC.   Look, if the rules say you have to hold at least 50 Hextra to transfer money on and off the site, and you can't follow that rule than there is nothing else to say.  We're talking about $50 and you're spending the time going on boards like this crying scam, and whinging about how you couldn't get it to work the way YOU want.  Bottom line is that the site does work, and I can tell you from experience that you can get coins and BTC on and off.  Shut up about the scam/conspiracy stuff already.

Author: kenmasters34
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: IMO its going to be hard to match that crazy ride, especially if they try it without lockouts like regal did. If you bought at 90 cents and sold at $96 USD, thats over 10000% return thats crazy.  So sad that I let the fud scare me off on that one. (Even though Regal's actions have been pretty scammy)  Hextra has a bonus plan thats intended to keep people in the platform at least till Dec 25th.  It sounds like a good idea and I am probably going to take them up on it.  If you keep or lend your ICO coins with them, they will give you a bonus HextraGold coin on Jan 1. If you keep your coins in the platform without lending, you will get 1 HextraGold coin for every 4 ICO coins you kept in.  If you lend with them, you will get 1 hextragold coin for every 2 ICO coins that you are lending through their platform.  Each HextraGold Coin is worth $20 in lending on their platform.     Doing the 4:1 math, thats equivalent to a $5 lending credit for each ICO hextracoin you keep on their platform until Dec $25th, OR equivalent to $10 lending credit for each ICO hextracoin you lent through their platform through Dec 25th.  Seems pretty enticing to me.  Hopefully Hextra pops to $5(or much better  ), that way I can sell 10-20% to get my investment back and keep the rest in platform.

Author: kristothek
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: I've been succesful buying this coin 4 times now. I did it exactly like this:  I make sure to have my password copied before the timer has counted down, so I don't have to type it in every time. I load up two tabs in the browser. When there is 1 second left I hit f5 to update the site. As fast as I can hit "Buy all", paste my password, type the captcha and hit Buy. Takes around six seconds. I immediately go to the second tab to do the same. If the site times out or shows an error, keep updating and going back and forth between the two tabs until you get through, or the ico is ended for the day.  This has worked 4 out of 6 times I've tried it and it worked for a friend of mine. Good luck!

Author: Knock91
Title: [ANN] HextraCoin Cryptocurrency ICO Live Now !!
Body: Hi guys i got a question and hopefully someone can help me.  i bought on BitMoney.eu Btcs and they transfered them to my wallet which i have on blockchain info. So far everything worked fine but as soon as i was logged in into blockchaininfo a transaction was immediately made without me doing anything. All my money gone within a second. There was a cancel button and i tried to click it several times but it didnt work. I know im in the wrong section but i didnt find anything simular and just wanted to give it a try here. So if anyone had/have the same problem or knows whats going on let me please know. This is what i got from the blockchaininfo support:  Hello,  An unconfirmed transaction will eventually be accepted into a block by whichever mining pool mines the block, or the transaction will eventually be rejected by the bitcoin network. If it eventually is rejected, then the funds would remain at the bitcoin address they were sent from. The only thing you can do at this point is to wait and see if the transaction is accepted into a block. Like all wallet providers, Blockchain.info has absolutely no control over this, and cannot expedite transactions. This is always dependent upon the bitcoin network of miners, which we are not a part of.  Blockchain.info wallets utilize dynamic fees. The following link explains how this works - https://blog.[Suspicious link removed]/2016/03/16/introducing-dynamic-fees/.
